brainly_data.question:
Which of the following were reasons why the Soviet Union was in such dire economic straits during the later 1980s?
drastically higher cost of oil imports
the protracted Afghanistan War
a series of failed economic programs
its Capitalistic economy was failing fast
increasing amounts of defense spending
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question:
Which of the following were reasons why the Soviet Union was in such dire economic straits during the later 1980s?
drastically higher cost of oil imports
the protracted Afghanistan War
a series of failed economic programs
its Capitalistic economy was failing fast
increasing amounts of defense spending
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: The best option from the list would be "a series of failed economic programs," since it was operating under a "command economy"--meaning that government had to "guess" supply and demand.
